original: caṇḍikādaṇḍakastotram
om namaḥ śrīcaṇḍikāyai
analyzed: om namaḥ śrī caṇḍikāyai

original: ūṃ ūṃ ūṃ ugracaṇḍaṃ cacakitacakitaṃ caṃcarā(lā)
analyzed: ūm ūm ūm ugra caṇḍam cacakita cakitam caṃcarālā

original: durganetraṃ
analyzed: durga netram

original: hū hū hūṃkārarūpaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ khaṅgapāśān dharantam |
analyzed: hū hū hūṃkāra rūpam prahasita vadanam khaṅga pāśān dharantam

original: daṃ daṃ daṃ daṇḍapāṇiṃ ḍamaruḍimiḍimāṃ ḍaṇḍamānaṃ bhramantaṃ
analyzed: daṃ daṃ daṃ daṇḍa pāṇim ḍamaru ḍimiḍimām ḍaṇḍamānam bhramantam

original: bhraṃ bhraṃ bhraṃ bhrāntanetraṃ jayatu vijayate siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 1 ||
analyzed: bhraṃ bhraṃ bhraṃ bhrānta netram jayatu vijayate siddhicaṇḍī namaḥ te

original: ghraṃ ghraṃ ghraṃ ghorarūpaṃ ghughuritaghuritaṃ ghargharīnādaghoṣaṃ
analyzed: ghraṃ ghraṃ ghraṃ ghora rūpam ghughurita ghuritam ghargharī nāda ghoṣam

original: huṃ huṃ huṃ hāsyarūpaṃ tribhuvanadharitaṃ khecaraṃ kṣetrapālam |
analyzed: hum hum hum hāsya rūpam tribhuvana dharitam khecaram kṣetrapālam

original: bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhūtanāthaṃ sakalajanahitaṃ tasya dehā (?) piśācaṃ
analyzed: bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhūtanātham sakala jana hitam tasya dehā piśācam

original: hū hū hūṃkāranādaiḥ sakalabhayaharaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 2 ||
analyzed: hū hū hūṃkāra nādaiḥ sakala bhaya haram siddhicaṇḍī namaḥ te

original: vraṃ vraṃ vraṃ vyomaghoraṃ bhramati bhuvanataḥ saptapātālatālaṃ
analyzed: vraṃ vraṃ vraṃ vyomaghoram bhramati bhuvanataḥ sapta pātāla tālam

original: kraṃ kraṃ kraṃ kāmarūpaṃ dhadhakitadhakitaṃ tasya haste triśūlam |
analyzed: kraṃ kraṃ kraṃ kāmarūpam tasya haste triśūlam

original: druṃ druṃ druṃ durgarūpaṃ bhramati ca caritaṃ tasya dehasvarūpaṃ
analyzed: drum drum drum durga rūpam bhramati ca caritam tasya deha svarūpam

original: maṃ maṃ maṃ mantrasiddhaṃ sakalabhayaharaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 3 ||
analyzed: maṃ maṃ maṃ mantra siddham sakala bhaya haram siddhicaṇḍī namaḥ te

original: jhaṃ jhaṃ jhaṃkārarūpaṃ jhamati jhamajhamā jhaṃjhamānā samantāt
analyzed: jhaṃ jhaṃ jhaṃkāra rūpam jhamati jhamajhamā jhaṃjhamānā samantāt

original: kaṃ kaṃ kaṃkāladhārī dhudhuritadhuritaṃ dhundhumārī kumārī |
analyzed: kaṃ kaṃ kaṃkāla dhārī dhudhurita dhuritam dhundhumārī kumārī

original: dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūmravarṇā bhramati bhuvanataḥ kālapāstriśūlaṃ
analyzed: dhūm dhūm dhūm dhūmra varṇā bhramati bhuvanataḥ kālapāḥ triśūlam

original: taṃ taṃ taṃ tīvrarūpaṃ mama bhayaharaṇaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 4 ||
analyzed: tam tam tam tīvra rūpam mama bhaya haraṇam siddhicaṇḍī namaḥ te

original: raṃ raṃ raṃ rāyarudraṃ rurudhitarudhitaṃ dīrghajihvākarālaṃ
analyzed: raṃ raṃ raṃ rāyarudram rurudhita rudhitam dīrgha jihvā karālam

original: paṃ paṃ paṃ pretarūpaṃ samayavijayinaṃ sumbhadambhe nisumbhe |
analyzed: paṃ paṃ paṃ preta rūpam samaya vijayinam sumbha dambhe nisumbhe

original: saṃgrāme prītiyāte jayatu vijayate sṛṣṭisaṃhārakārī
analyzed: saṃgrāme prīti yāte jayatu vijayate sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kārī

original: hrīṃ hrīṃ hrīṃkāranāde bhavabhayaharaṇaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 5 ||
analyzed: hrīṃ hrīṃ hrīṃkāra nāde bhava bhaya haraṇam siddhicaṇḍī namaḥ te

original: hūṃkārī kālarupī narapiśitamukhā sāndraraudrārajihve
hūkārī ghoranāde paramaśiraśikhā hāratī piṅgalākṣe |
analyzed: hūkārī ghora nāde parama śira śikhā hāratī piṅgala akṣe

original: paṅke jātābhijāte curu curu curute kāminī kāṇḍakaṇṭhe
analyzed: paṅke jāta abhijāte curu curu curute kāminī kāṇḍa kaṇṭhe

original: kaṅkālī kālarātrī bhagavati varade siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 6 ||
analyzed: kaṅkālī kālarātrī bhagavati vara de siddhicaṇḍī namaḥ te

original: ṣṭrīṃ ṣṭrīṃ ṣṭrīṃkāranāde tribhuvananamite ghoraghorātighoraṃ
analyzed: ṣṭrīṃ ṣṭrīṃ ṣṭrīṃkāra nāde tribhuvana namite ghora ghora ati ghoram

original: kaṃ kaṃ kaṃ kālarūpaṃ ghughuritaghuritaṃ ghuṃ ghumā bindurūpī |
analyzed: kaṃ kaṃ kaṃ kāla rūpam ghughurita ghuritam ghuṃ ghumā bindu rūpī

original: dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūmravarṇā bhramati bhuvanataḥ kālapāśatriśūlaṃ
analyzed: dhūm dhūm dhūm dhūmra varṇā bhramati bhuvanataḥ kālapāśa triśūlam

original: taṃ taṃ taṃ tīvrarūpaṃ mama bhayaharaṇaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 7 ||
analyzed: tam tam tam tīvra rūpam mama bhaya haraṇam siddhicaṇḍī namaḥ te

original: jhrīṃ jhrīṃ jhrīṃkāravṛnde pracaritamahasā vāmahaste kapālaṃ
analyzed: jhrīṃ jhrīṃ jhrīṃkāra vṛnde pracarita mahasā vāma haste kapālam

original: khaṃ khaṃ khaṃ khaṅgahaste ḍamaruḍimaḍimāṃ muṇḍamālāsuśobhām |
analyzed: khaṃ khaṃ khaṃ khaṅga haste ḍamaru ḍima ḍimām muṇḍa mālā su śobhām

original: ruṃ ruṃ ruṃ rudramālābharaṇavibhūṣitā dirghajihvā karālā
analyzed: ruṃ ruṃ ruṃ rudra mālā ābharaṇa vibhūṣitā dirgha jihvā karālā

original: devi śrī ugracaṇḍī bhagavati varade siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 8 ||
analyzed: devi śrī ugracaṇḍī bhagavati vara de siddhicaṇḍī namaḥ te  /

original: āruṇavarṇasaṅkāśā khaḍgapheṭakabindukā |
analyzed: āruṇa varṇa saṅkāśā khaḍga pheṭaka bindukā

original: kāmarūpī mahādevī ugracaṇḍī namo'stute ||9 ||
analyzed: kāmarūpī mahādevī ugracaṇḍī namaḥ stu te

original: śrī caṇḍikādaṇḍakastotraṃ samāptam |
analyzed: śrī caṇḍikādaṇḍaka stotram samāptam
